item.title: Setting up networking between VirtualBox VMs
item.description: Networking in VirtualBox Link to heading There are several modes one can use for networking in VirtualBox. In this article I presented one way for network setup. VMs talk each other using internal network separated from the host machine. Additionaly, I created OpnSense router to access VMs in internal network from the host. To quickly spin desired number of VMs I used VBoxManage CLI utility and Ubuntu VBox cloud image.
